cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Foreign Affairs on March 25, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 2118, Securing America From Epidemics Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 54 (Tuesday, March 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BERA:
H.R. 2118.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H1621]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

title: Securing America From Epidemics Act
